        @RequestMapping(value="/hireFreelancer")
public java.lang.String hireFreelancer(@RequestParam(value="f_id")
                                                                                 java.lang.Integer freelancerId,
                                                                                 @RequestParam(value="p_id")
                                                                                 java.lang.Integer projectId)
        Parameters:
        freelancerId - Id of freelancer who is being hired.
        projectId - Id of project for which freelancer is being hired.
        Returns:
        redirect link to send an email to the freelancer about hiring.
